lead_paragraph: Lyudmila M. Alexeyeva was attacked Wednesday while visiting a memorial in a subway station that was bombed by terrorists on Monday.
snippet: Lyudmila M. Alexeyeva was attacked Wednesday while visiting a memorial in a subway station that was bombed by terrorists on Monday.

headline.main: Russian Rights Advocate, 82, Attacked in Moscow
